thread.title: The First Clip From "Mockingjay Part 2" Confirms That Finnick Is Still Hot
thread.title_full: The First Clip From "Mockingjay Part 2" Confirms That Finnick Is Still Hot

author: Cosmopolitan.com
title: The First Clip From "Mockingjay Part 2" Confirms That Finnick Is Still Hot
text:
​The release of ​The Hunger Games: Mockingjay - Part 2 ​is just over a month away, which means it's about time for a steady stream of clips to start rolling in until you've seen about 50 percent of the movie before the premiere date even arrives. On Thursday, the first of these promotional treats arrived in the form of a nice exchange between Katniss and Finnick, the latter of whom was forced to forgo his honeymoon in favor of war. He's still really good-looking though, so at least he's got that going for him.
Advertisement - Continue Reading Below After Katniss and Finnick hug and you get jealous, Boggs warns everybody what awaits them in the Capitol — pods, mutts, and all manner of President Snow-created terrors. "Ladies and gentlemen, welcome to the 76th Hunger Games," Finnick deadpans. He's such a charmer.
&amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;/noscript&amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;
​Follow Eliza on Twitter .
